short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate tab management extension crafted for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your productivity with Tabs Saver, the ultimate tab management extension crafted for Google Chrome. Experience a faster and more efficient computer with Tabs Saver, reducing CPU load. Enjoy up to 95% memory savings, eliminating tab clutter and providing a responsive browsing environment. Organize and save tab sets effortlessly, tailoring your browsing experience to match your workflow seamlessly.

Tabs Saver is your go-to solution for a more organized and efficient browsing workflow. Simplify your tab management today!

Key Features:

Save and Organize Tabs:
- Save groups of tabs under customizable names. Whether it's project-related, daily tasks, or research topics, keep your tabs organized and accessible.

Effortless Tab Retrieval:
- Open saved sets of tabs with a single click. No more searching through your history or bookmarksâ€”get back to work instantly.

Intuitive Interface:
- A clean and user-friendly interface ensures a seamless experience. Save and manage your tabs effortlessly with the simple and effective design.

Customization Options:
- Personalize your tab sets with unique names, making it easy to distinguish between different projects or tasks.

Visual Confirmation:
- Easily identify your saved tab sets with a glance. The extension provides a clear list of your saved sets for quick reference.

How Tabs Saver Works:
1. Name your tab set.
2. Save your current tabs to create a set.
3. Click the dropdown button next to your tab set to view the tabs within that set.
4. Within the dropdown, you can click on individual tabs to load only that tab's page.
5. Alternatively, click the tab set itself to load all tabs within that set for a comprehensive browsing experience.

Additional Benefits:
- Depending on the number of scripts running inside your tabs, Tabs Saver can speed up your computer by reducing the CPU load.
- Users have reported faster computer resume times from sleep.
- Tabs Saver saves up to 95% of memory, reducing tab clutter.
- Tabs Saver offers excellent customer support, ensuring you have a smooth experience with our extension.

Enjoy continuous updates with new features, enhancing your tab management experience.
We encourage users to send us their recommendations for features or improvements; your feedback is valuable to us!

Note: This extension uses your local storage to save tab sets, ensuring your data stays private and secure.
